title: Default
description: Default Button in ILIAS. This is the most commonly used button instance in ILIAS and should be used, whenever there is not a good reason to use a special instance. Buttons are either of type input (with some cmd) or link (with some href).

lessVariables.title: brand-primary
lessVariables.description: Background and border color of the button. The hover-bg color is also a version (darken 10%) of this color value.
